name: My_Landing_Page
title: Personal Landing Page
description: Responsive landing page with Tailwind, to showcase my Projects on Github.

name: NamPay
title: QR-code Mobile Payment Application Prototype
description: A QR code mobile money transfer application prototype designed to tackle cash dependency in Namibia, enabling cross-bank transfers using linked mock bank cards and QR codes.

name: NLP_Quiz_Generator
title: Natural Language Processing Quiz Generator
description: An AI-powered quiz generator that creates quizzes from text, topics, or uploaded documents. Supports multiple question types (MCQ, True/False, Fill Blank, Math), difficulty levels, semantic validation, and a monitoring dashboard.

name: hospital_app
title: Hospital Management System
description: A comprehensive hospital management application. This application includes advanced features like user authentication, medical record management, prescription tracking, and doctor availability scheduling.

name: Ace-Tech-Website
title: Technology Company Consulting Website
description: A small business website for Ace Technologies with a booking flow that saves consultations to a MySQL/MariaDB database

name: Hotel-Booking-System
title: Namibia Hotel Booking System
description: A comprehensive, production-grade hotel booking system. This system provides a complete solution for hotel reservations with advanced features including concurrency controls, payment processing, review systems, and administrative tools.
